thread.title: Is Karisma Kapoor Going To Make Her Relationship Official?
thread.title_full: Is Karisma Kapoor Going To Make Her Relationship Official?

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Is Karisma Kapoor Going To Make Her Relationship Official?
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 17 . 2017 Karisma Kapoor and Sandeep Toshniwal 
The Kapoors recently got together to celebrate Randhir Kapoo r’s 70th birthday – and the entire clan was present in full force. Daughters Karisma Kapoor , Kareena Kapoor and son-in-law Saif Ali Khan even took a cute selfie with papa Randhir at the bash. 
According to a report in DNA , Lolo was accompanied by her rumoured boyfriend Sandeep Toshniwal for the party. Although he has often been spotted with her at various B-town parties, this was the first time Sandeep was spotted at a family function, which was attended by close friends and family only. 
Hmm. Is marriage on the cards for Lolo? Fingers crossed! 39
